entry.title: LOVE
entry.summary:
LOVE is a reductive platforming game with a minimalist and a focus on a challenging difficulty. It has an custom respawn system, 16 levels, a 12 track original soundtrack, competitive scoring and time attack modes, and custom level support.
Free Now to 2024-01-25T16:00:00.000Z
